dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: Welcome to our village! We don't get many visitors here.

dialogue.speaker: Eira
dialogue.text: I'm just passing through. I'm on a quest to find the legendary Sword of Light.

dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: The Sword of Light? That's a legend from ancient times. Many have attempted to find it, but none have returned.

dialogue.speaker: Eira
dialogue.text: I'm not one to believe in rumors and legends. I'll find that sword if it's the last thing I do.

dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: I admire your determination, Eira. But be warned: the journey will be treacherous, and you're not the only one searching for the sword.
